How is there no scientific explanation in this whatsoever? Do you guys not have Hydro flasks? Creating a vacuum seal drastically reduces temperature transfer because the molecules are not there to react across. Hence why my vacuum seal flask will keep things warm or cold for days. Vacuum sealing a pot to cook in means the metal directly contacting the steak will of course transfer heat. The lack of air around the steak cannot transfer heat and therefore fails to cook the steak properly. This is how the middle of the steak ends up not cooked. This all seems obvious to me as I'm sure it does many others. But many watching your show would not understand this. Maybe try to explain it to them.
